card.title: Angular Template
card.github: This app has been generated using @souyahia's Angular App Template.
card.keyFeatures: Here are the key features available & generated for you :
card.bootstrap: Bootstrap & icons support using ng-bootstrap and bootstrap-icons
card.content: Assets directory containing images, fonts and global styles.
card.shared: A shared module containing components, directives and pipes that are shared between feature modules.
card.core: A core module containing elements such as core app components (navbar...), interceptors, guards...
